odysseus.common.controllers

Class BullpenToBoardMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • odysseus.common.controllers.Move
      • odysseus.common.controllers.BullpenToBoardMove

  • public class BullpenToBoardMove
extends Move
    The BullpenToBoardMove moves a piece from the level's bullpen to the level's board. In order for this piece to be valid, the squares of the piece must be allowed to fit onto the board. It may not overlap with squares already in play or go beyond the limits of the board
    Author:
    Carlos Barcelos

      • valid

        public boolean valid(Kabasuji game)
        Iterates through the piece's squares to the corresponding board to check if any piece-squares are moving to invalid board-squares.
        Specified by:
        valid in class Move
        Returns:
        False - If any squares overlap which should not. Otherwise returns true.
